com.example.client.controller

类 Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.client.controller.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object

    This class is the controller part of the MVC design pattern, and it also completes the singletom design pattern, any viewer or model could get the instance of controller via the static method getController().

    This class control all the logic parts of this software, corresponding with viewer's request, drive models to handle these requests, and control the software work status transfer during its running.

    author: Piasy Xu

    date: 21:25 2013/12/11

    email: xz4215@gmail.com

    github: Piasy

    • 方法详细资料

      • getController

        public static Controller getController()
        This method will return the sigletom instance of controller, all viewers or models will get the same controller, no matter when and where they call this method.
        参数:
        none -
        返回:
        the only instance of controller

      • signin

        public void signin(java.lang.String username,
          java.lang.String password,
          java.lang.String target)
        The signin method, most robust. When a signin request is made by viewer, controller will let SigninModel to communicate with LoginServer.
        For more specific information, please see SigninModel.
        参数:
        username, - password, target hall name

      • signout

        public void signout()
        The signout method. This method won't send message to server any more, due to the changes of LoginServer. It just let the software status change to signin status.
        参数:
        none -

      • signup

        public void signup(java.lang.String username,
          java.lang.String password,
          java.lang.String passwordConfirm,
          java.lang.String name)
        The signup method. When a signup request is made by viewer, controller will let SignupModel to communicate with RegisterServer.
        For more specific information, please see SignupModel.
        参数:
        username, - password, password confirm, nickname

      • getHallSnapShot

        public java.lang.String getHallSnapShot(int startRoomNum,
                               int endRoomNum)
        Get the detail info of given range rooms. This method will return the status of rooms which number range between startRoomNum and endRoomNum.
        When viewers want to know what is in the hall, especially in some rooms, controller will let HallModel to give those information, which will be uphold during the running of this software.
        For more specific information, please see HallModel. change: pageNum -> room range
        参数:
        [startRoomNum, - endRoomNum]
        返回:
        json format string

      • getMyDetails

        public JSONObject getMyDetails()
        Get user self details. This method will return the detail information of the player himself. When viewers want to know it, controller will let HallModel to give this information, which will be uphold during the running of this software.
        For more specific information, please see HallModel.
        参数:
        none -
        返回:
        json format string

      • getMyRoomNum

        public int getMyRoomNum()
        Get player himself current room number. When viewers want to know it, controller will let HallModel to give this information, which will be uphold during the running of this software.
        For more specific information, please see HallModel.
        参数:
        none -
        返回:
        current room number, -1 if not in any room

      • isGameStart

        public boolean isGameStart()
        Query whether game starts.
        参数:
        none -
        返回:
        whether game starts

      • enter

        public void enter(int roomNum,
         int seatPos)
        Enter the specific room and specific position. When viewers send this request, controller will let HallModel to send this request to HallServer. The result will be send to viewer via handler when HallModel receive the message which say that the player himself has got in this room.
        For more specific information, please see HallModel.
        参数:
        room - num, seat position

      • enter

        public void enter(int roomNum)
        Enter the specific room and any position. When viewers send this request, controller will let HallModel to send this request to HallServer. The result will be send to viewer via handler when HallModel receive the message which say that the player himself has got in this room.
        For more specific information, please see HallModel.
        参数:
        room - num

      • enter

        public void enter()
        Enter any room and any position. When viewers send this request, controller will let HallModel to send this request to HallServer. The result will be send to viewer via handler when HallModel receive the message which say that the player himself has got in this room.
        For more specific information, please see HallModel.
        参数:
        none -

      • leave

        public void leave()
        Leave current room. When viewers send this request, controller will let HallModel to send this request to HallServer. The result will be send to viewer via handler when HallModel receive the message which say that the player himself has left this room.
        For more specific information, please see HallModel.
        参数:
        none -

      • ready

        public void ready()
        Ready for game. When viewers send this request, controller will let HallModel to send this request to HallServer. The result will be send to viewer via handler when HallModel receive the message which say that the player himself has been ready.
        For more specific information, please see HallModel.
        参数:
        none -

      • unready

        public void unready()
        Unready for game. When viewers send this request, controller will let HallModel to send this request to HallServer. The result will be send to viewer via handler when HallModel receive the message which say that the player himself has been unready.
        For more specific information, please see HallModel.
        参数:
        none -

      • setHandler

        public void setHandler(Handler viewerHandler)
        Set handler of viewer activity, used for send message.
        参数:
        viewerHandler -

      • setMapID

        public void setMapID(int id)
        Set the map ID of game.
        参数:
        map - ID

      • getMapID

        public int getMapID()
        Query the map ID
        参数:
        none -
        返回:
        map ID

      • changeMoveStatus

        public void changeMoveStatus(int code)
        When user touch the screen, call this method with code [0, 3]. When user release, call this method with code 4 When viewers send this request, controller will let GameModel to send this request to GameServer. For more specific information, please see GameModel.
        参数:
        code: - 0 up 1 down 2 left 3 right 4 stop others illegal

      • placeBomb

        public void placeBomb()
        Place a bomb. When viewers send this request, controller will let GameModel to send this request to GameServer. For more specific information, please see GameModel.
        参数:
        none -

      • getGameStatus

        public java.lang.String getGameStatus()
        Get game status, the map, prop, player, bomb info, which will be used for viewer to draw the game view. When viewers want to know what is in the hall, especially in some rooms, controller will let GameModel to give those information, which will be uphold during the running of this software.
        For more specific information, please see GameModel.
        参数:
        none -
        返回:
        game status info

      • setGameToOver

        public void setGameToOver()
        Set game status to over. When GameModel receive the game over information, it will call this method to let controller change the software status to room.
        参数:
        none -

      • getCurrentMessage

        public java.lang.String getCurrentMessage(int length)
        Get talk messages. When viewers want to know it, controller will let HallModel to give this information, which will be uphold during the running of this software.
        For more specific information, please see HallModel.
        参数:
        message - count
        返回:
        json format string

      • sendTalkMessage

        public void sendTalkMessage(java.lang.String message)
        Send talk messages When viewers want to send message, controller will let HallModel to send it to HallServer.
        For more specific information, please see HallModel.
        参数:
        message - to send

      • getCurPos

        public int getCurPos()
        Get current position of the player himself.
        参数:
        none -
        返回:
        current position code, For more specific information, please see Config.
